short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays anime girls on screen. Enjoy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension displays new girls in anime style on the webpage whenever the user changes the URL. It's possible to click and drag the image in case it's covering other content.
